text:
<@U2H3TT8F2> have there been reports of issues with the auth api? I'm getting:

A RequestError has occurred. Error: getaddrinfo EAI_AGAIN <http://api.hubapi.com|api.hubapi.com>
when using hs auth and then entering my key
Is there any documentation for the HS video player? I just want to be able to play and pause it with javascript. I did a search on here, but none of what I found worked. Thanks!

Hi <#C22PU4LV8|general> Came across the "*Upcoming Sunset: JSON Custom Cards"* however would like to understand if this will affect the CRM cards feature? Actually, we are planning to deploy app to HubSpot marketplace using which we can offer our customers to load their data into CRM cards from external system. Thus, checking if it's going to impact the CRM cards feature by any chance?

Thanks
